mapper.select: select a.id, to_char(a.created,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as created, a.created_id, concat(coalesce(b.last_name,''),coalesce(b.first_name,'')) as created_name, to_char(a.modified,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as modified, a.modified_id, concat(coalesce(c.last_name,''),coalesce(c.first_name,'')) as modified_name, a.status, a.building_name, a.building_address, a.building_image, a.building_url from base_address a left join auth_user b on a.created_id = b.id left join auth_user c on a.modified_id = c.id order by a.id

select a.id, to_char(a.created,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as created, a.created_id, concat(coalesce(b.last_name,''),coalesce(b.first_name,'')) as created_name, to_char(a.modified,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as modified, a.modified_id, concat(coalesce(c.last_name,''),coalesce(c.first_name,'')) as modified_name, a.status, a.building_name, a.building_address, a.building_image, a.building_url from base_address a left join auth_user b on a.created_id = b.id left join auth_user c on a.modified_id = c.id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into base_address( created, created_id, modified, modified_id, status, building_name, building_address, building_image, building_url ) values ( now(), #{created_id}, now(), #{modified_id}, #{status}, #{building_name}, #{building_address}, #{building_image}, #{building_url} )
mapper.update: update base_address set modified = now(), modified_id = #{modified_id}, status = #{status}, building_name = #{building_name}, building_address = #{building_address}, building_image = #{building_image}, building_url = #{building_url} where id = #{id}
